EmailInputEdit: Please rememeber to always post-process the case in order to be able to export it.
Issue: the inquiry you had about how to export a patient's case as STL
Probing Questions (Add Info):
How long has been Happening this issue?
Is happening with all the cases or just this one?
Have you done an update on the software?
Have anything changed on the network or the commputer lin the last days?
Do you have more scanners?
How many computer do you use?
Solution: adressed this request by Go to cases > select any order you would like to export in DCM/STL/PLY format > open the three-dot menu > select Export > then Scan. After that, the case was successfully saved on the location you selected
Step 1: Explain to her how to export a post-processed case as STL file
Step 2: Select the three dots that appear at the right of the case
Step 4: Then choose the location and name the file
